#summary This is the main index of the language and standard library documentation.

= Special constructs =

Things that have syntactic sugar in the language:
 * [Numbers] - floating point numbers (double precision)
 * [Strings] - text strings (Unicode)
 * [Lists] - indexed containers (an immutable array)
 * [Dictionaries] - associative containers (also called a map)
 * [Functions] - lambda/anonymous functions (closures)
 * [Variables]
 * [Modules]

= Modules =

No modules yet.
